Sample.Title: SF_RRE2_104cipR_104wt_LBlog_A_7DE1141

Channel.Organism: Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Enteritidis
Channel.Label: Cy3
Channel.Label-Protocol: incorporation of Cy3-dCTP with Superscript RT and random hexamers

Channel.Organism: Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Enteritidis
Channel.Label: Cy5
Channel.Label-Protocol: incorporation of Cy5-dCTP using Klenow enzyme and random hexamers

Sample.Hybridization-Protocol: overnight hyb on Corning UltraGAPS slides at 42°C in 25% formamide / 5xSSC / 0.1% BSA
Sample.Scan-Protocol: Axon 4100A scanner, image acquisition with GenePix software, spot quantification using Quantarray 3.0 software, adaptive quantification, protocol STv7S_01_051201
Sample.Description: biological replicate, Date of Scan Tue Feb 26 15:04:14 2008
Sample.Data-Processing: normalized based on total signal for each channel, background subtracted VALUE data obtained from log of normalized background subtracted ch1/ch2 signal.

Series.Title: Salmonella enteritidis ciprofloxacin resistance effect on transcription in LB
Series.Summary: comparison of total RNA profiles obtained from ciprofloxacin resistant colonies of two separate Enteritidis isolates with their respective wt parents
Series.Overall-Design: total RNA of both wt (with reduced cip sensitivity at MIC=0.2 ug/ml) and spontaneous cipR mutants (MIC>32ug/ml) in LB log phase was harvested from Enteritidis strain 104 (from poultry host) and Enteritidis 5408 (from human host), and compared on a PCR product array
